title: Bella Hadid steps out amid rumors she is back with her ex The Weeknd
text:
Bella Hadid was spotted out as rumors emerged she had reconciled with her ex boyfriend, The Weeknd.

The catwalk queen, 23, was seen in New York City wearing a cherry print sweater, baggy trousers, and cool shades on Friday.

Bella is reportedly back with The Weeknd, just weeks after calling time on their relationship for a second time, according to E! News.

On again? Bella Hadid was spotted out as rumors emerged she had reconciled with her ex boyfriend, The Weeknd

Insiders told the website the I Feel It Coming singer sent Bella a birthday message as she celebrated turning 23 earlier this week.

The model was reportedly seen leaving her birthday dinner in her ex's car.

There was no sign of her apparently on-again flame during Friday's outing.

Bella was looking picture perfect for the day in a white, cherry print sweater with coordinating baggy trousers and sleek shades.

Cherry on top: Hadid looked delightful in a cherry print sweater with a pink butterfly print top

She wore a pink butterfly print top beneath her sweater, and her hair slicked back into a chic updo.

The model appeared deep in thought as she left her hotel, brandishing an array of items.

She carried a leather tote on her arm, a small handbag over her shoulder, and of course her trusty cell phone.

On the move: The model appeared deep in thought as she left her hotel, brandishing an array of items

It has been a whirlwind few days for the birthday girl.

Aside from reportedly getting back together with The Weeknd, the model has been busy celebrating her 23rd birthday.

On Thursday night she rang in the milestone year alongside sister Gigi and brother Anwar.

Celebrate good times! Aside from reportedly getting back together with The Weeknd, the model has been busy celebrating her 23rd birthday

It was just one of several times this week Bella celebrated the special occasion, including Wednesday night, which saw her enjoy a birthday dinner at Miss Lily's.

It was after that same party Bella was reportedly seen heading into The Weeknd's car.

Bella and The Weeknd have had an off-again, on-again relationship these last four years.

Happy birthday Bella! On Thursday night she rang in the milestone year alongside sister Gigi and brother Anwar

Their most recent split in August marked the second time the couple had called it quits.

Distance played a role in the demise of the relationship, according to E!.

'They are in different places right now, physically and mentally,' a source told the outlet.

'Bella is prepping for her fashion week commitments and Abel is working on his music and his upcoming acting debut.'
description: The catwalk queen, 23, was seen in New York City wearing a cherry print sweater, baggy trousers, and cool shades.
